attributes.action: Stop the closure of Sandbach Community Primary School by Cheshire County Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The People of Sandbach were horrified to see CCC's Transforming Learning in Communities or TLC document. The document is supposed to be designed to reduce surplus school places, it does not however take everything into account. Anybody who does not want the Community of Sandbach to be destroyed needs to sign up!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of Sandbach Community Primary School by Cheshire County Council."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20312


Prime Minister's Office
